+---------+------------------------------------+
| `p`     | matrix norm                        |
+=========+====================================+
| `NULL`  | `2`-norm (largest singular value)  |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `'fro'` | Frobenius norm                     |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `'nuc'` | nuclear norm                       |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `Inf`   | `max(sum(abs(x), dim=2))`          |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `-Inf`  | `min(sum(abs(x), dim=2))`          |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `1`     | `max(sum(abs(x), dim=1))`          |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `-1`    | `min(sum(abs(x), dim=1))`          |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `2`     | largest singular value             |
+---------+------------------------------------+
| `-2`    | smallest singular value            |
+---------+------------------------------------+
